original_text: And I am exceedingly angry with the nations that are at ease; for while I was angry but a little, they furthered the disaster.
korean_text: 안일한 여러 나라들 때문에 심히 진노하나니 나는 조금 노하였거늘 그들은 힘을 내어 고난을 더하였음이라

sentences.original_text: And I am exceedingly angry with the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 여러 나라에 대하여 심히 노하였으니

sentences.original_text: for while I was angry but a little
